recurringEvents.title: MEGAMIND MOVIE NIGHT
recurringEvents.description:
Join us for Movie Weekend! We're watching Megamind together. Grab your snacks and get ready for some quality movie time with the crew.

**MOVIE NIGHT GUIDELINES:**
• Join the voice channel 15 minutes early for setup and socializing
• Short breaks are allowed for bathroom/emergency purposes
• Keep spoilers to a minimum during the movie
• Use reactions to express your thoughts without spoiling
• Stay muted during the movie unless you're the host
• Have fun and enjoy the film together!

**TECHNICAL NOTES:**
• Movie will be streamed via screen share
• Make sure your connection is stable
• Test your audio before the movie starts
• Questions welcome in text chat during the film
